channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Enforcement camera vandalised, 11th December
item.description:
The camera overseeing the new traffic filter has been moved so it’s pointing upwards to the sky. It needs to be realigned so cars passing through the filter can be captured Junction of Mildmay Rd and King Henry's Walk
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, King Henry's Walk, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage, 11th December
item.description:
Bus and heavy vehicles damaging the road around the drain and I it will give way at some point unless someone urgently looks at repairing the tarmac around the drain. It’s outside 68CNR.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62-76, Camberwell New Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the right shortly after the start of the pedestrian alleyway between 83 and 85 South Hill Park, leading to Parliament Hillay between, 11th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parliament Hill, Gospel Oak, Greater London

item.title: Graffiti on our fence, 11th December
item.description:
This graffiti has been reported to Harris school in Manor Way for over a year. I have emailed them and the local MP has contacted them, but they are ignoring my request to clean my fence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, Greater London

item.title: Street slippery with wet leaves, 11th December
item.description:
Please can the street be swept clean. Currently Penton Place on the side opposite to Pullens Gardens is littered with leaves and some litter. This has been reported previously but the leaves have not been swept. The pavement is very slippery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Penton Place, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
